sections.title: Role Context & Project Overview
sections.goal: Understand the interviewee's responsibilities within Vesta FinOps and their alignment with company mission and SLAs.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your primary responsibilities on Vesta FinOps?
How does your work tie into the company's 'Cloud Cost Budgets & Quotas' policy (POL-FIN-007)?
Which SLAs or SLOs are most relevant to your role?

sections.title: Operational Processes & Runbooks
sections.goal: Explore how the interviewee uses runbooks and RFCs to manage cost optimization and guardrails.
sample_questions: Could you describe a recent situation where you applied RB-FIN-007 Idle Resource Reaper?
How do you integrate RFC-1502 Resource Quotas & Budgets into daily operations?
What unwritten rules or heuristics guide you when policies and runbooks are ambiguous?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify how Vesta FinOps interacts with other projects and subsystems to achieve cost efficiency.
sample_questions: Which other projects in the portfolio have the biggest cost impact on Vesta FinOps?
How do you coordinate with the SRE or Platform teams on budget enforcement?
Can you give an example of a multi-hop dependency affecting a cost decision?

sections.title: Forecasting & Budget Management
sections.goal: Assess techniques and tools used for forecasting and maintaining sustainable velocity within budget constraints.
sample_questions: What forecasting models or tools do you rely on most?
How do you handle unexpected cost spikes without breaching SLAs?
Describe a time when you had to adjust forecasts due to scope changes in another project.

sections.title: Decision Making & Risk Management
sections.goal: Evaluate how the interviewee makes tradeoffs between cost, performance, and compliance, using evidence and policy.
sample_questions: Describe a decision where you had to choose between higher performance and lower cost.
What evidence did you gather to justify your choice?
How do you assess the risk of breaching cost guardrails?

sections.title: Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Understand how the interviewee drives ongoing optimization and learning within FinOps practices.
sample_questions: What metrics do you track to measure FinOps maturity?
How do you feed incident learnings back into forecasts and budgets?
Can you share a recent improvement initiative and its impact?
